name: Lastfly
description:
Earth does not exist anymore...

can you hear the human's screams in your head?

take the commands of your ship and have the earth revenged!

LASTFLY is a 2D Shoot them up game including :

- 12 levels ans Boss

- 1 timeshift system

- 1 overpowered evolutive plasma shot

- 5 evolutive weapons

- 2 evolutive shields

- 3 special Combo attacks uncluding unblocked partners all along the game

config min :

windows xp/vista/seven/win 8

dual core 2 ghz

1 go ram

300 mo hdd

more on : http://www.lasfly.fr
